text: Joel Molina Ramírez (1 November 194224 October 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Senate, representing the state of Tlaxcala from 2019 until his death. He was a member of the National Regeneration Movement (MORENA) party. Molina was born in Ixtacuixtla, Mexico. Molina Ramírez died of COVID-19 on October 24, 2020 in Tlaxcala, Mexico at the age of 75.Fallece senador de Morena Joel Molina Ramírez por Covid-19 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Category:Politicians from Tlaxcala
title: Joel Molina Ramírez
